Articles.Content:
Hey all,

I accidentally deleted the .cfg files for my KSP game, so I have a new install. I'm looking for some new mods to install, especially ones that add clouds and such. Does anybody have any suggestions?

-Mac :)
Kerbal Engineer is really good. What do you most prefer in KSP?
Am I allowed to come shill in this thread? I'd be more than obliged to.
